original_text: When Paul and Barnabas arrived in Iconium, they did the same as they had done before. They went to the Jewish meeting place and they spoke God's message there. They spoke very clearly, so that many Jews and Gentiles believed in Jesus.
korean_text: 이에 이고니온에서 두 사도가 함께 유대인의 회당에 들어가 말하니 유대와 헬라의 허다한 무리가 믿더라

sentences.original_text: When Paul and Barnabas arrived in Iconium
they did the same as they had done before
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 이전에 했던 것과 똑같이 했습니다

sentences.original_text: They went to the Jewish meeting place
and they spoke God's message there
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 거기서 하나님의 메시지를 전파했습니다

sentences.original_text: so that many Jews and Gentiles believed in Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 많은 유대인과 이방인들이 예수를 믿게 되었습니다
